original_title: A Horse Has More Blood Than a Human
overview: An old couple leaves Tehran to return to their town on the Turkish border, which has become a clandestine gateway into Europe. Abolfazl Talooni sounds out the ambiguity of a people forced to participate in this traffic and dispossessed of their lands, where the beauty of the landscapes sketches out geopolitics of despair.
title: A Horse Has More Blood Than a Human
